Class AddAppointmentController

extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the adding appointment controller and scene.

      • addAppClick

        public void addAppClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is for clicking add appointment button. By clicking the button the appointment is added from the fields provided. This also performs validation and DB queries.
        Parameters:
        event - mouseevent on click
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • cancelAddAppClick

        public void cancelAddAppClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        This method cancels adding a appointment. By click the button the scene will change back to main appointment screen and alert.
        Parameters:
        event - mouse event on click
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getTimes

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.time.LocalTime> getTimes()
        This method gets the times. The method creates times in an observable array that are local. This includes hours and minutes
        Returns:
        Returns the times

      • getTypes

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getTypes()
        This method gets the types of appointments. The appointments are added into an observable string for the combo box.
        Returns:
        Returns the types

      • generateApptID

        public void generateApptID()
        This method generates appointment ID. Generates appointment ID from the DB and places it into the appointment ID field.

      • loadApptComboBoxes

        public void loadApptComboBoxes()
        This method loads the appointment combo boxes. The method selects all information from the DB to display in each combo box.

      • apptCancelAlert

        public static void apptCancelAlert​(int id)
        This method is an appointment cancel alert. Method projects a cancel alert to confirm cancellation of appointment.
        Parameters:
        id - integer id displayed

      • apptAddAlert

        public static void apptAddAlert​(java.lang.String s)
        This method is an appointment add alert. This alert is a confirmation for an appointment to be added.
        Parameters:
        s - string for appointment name is displayed

      • validateAppointment

        public boolean validateAppointment​(java.time.LocalDateTime utcStart,
                                   java.time.LocalDateTime utcEnd,
                                   int customerId,
                                   int appointmentId)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is a validation method for appointments. The method checks for conflicting appointments with an existing customer as boolean.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - appointment id
        customerId - customer id
        utcEnd - UTC end time
        utcStart - UTC start time
        Returns:
        Returns true of false for conflicting appointments.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
